name: Chef-Fu VR
description:
Welcome to Chef Foo's kitchen, home of the mystical culinary art of Chef-Fu!

Take up your blade and sharpen your skills against an endless onslaught of flying food; every item cut will increase your score, as well as charge your Blade Frenzy ability, which will slow time to a crawl and spawn more food to slice. 

Uncut food items carry a penalty - on top of partially draining your Blade Frenzy charge, they will remove one Star from your restaurant's score. Lose all five stars, and it's game over. Activating your Blade Frenzy has a chance to restore a lost star - don't count on it to be your saving grace every time, though.

Compete against your own scores and aim for the top to become the restaurant ronin, the nutrition ninja, the snack samurai - the master of Chef-Fu!
